0.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
0.title: The Departed
0.writer: William Monahan (screenplay), Alan Mak, Felix Chong
0.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg

1.plot: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate stage illusion.
1.title: The Prestige
1.writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Priest (novel)
1.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 32 nominations.
1.actors: Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo

2.plot: A murder inside the Louvre and clues in Da Vinci paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years -- which could shake the foundations of Christianity.
2.title: The Da Vinci Code
2.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 21 nominations.
2.actors: Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Ian McKellen, Jean Reno

3.plot: In the falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.
3.title: Pan's Labyrinth
3.actors: Ivana Baquero, Sergi López, Maribel Verdú, Doug Jones

4.plot: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.
4.title: Cars
4.writer: John Lasseter (original story by), Joe Ranft (original story by), Jorgen Klubien (original story by), Dan Fogelman (screenplay), John Lasseter (screenplay), Joe Ranft (screenplay), Kiel Murray (screenplay), Phil Lorin (screenplay), Jorgen Klubien (screenplay)
4.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 27 wins & 28 nominations.
4.actors: Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy

5.plot: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, the rulers insist the key to prosperity is to build more temples and offer human sacrifices. Jaguar Paw, a young man captured for sacrifice, flees to avoid his fate.
5.title: Apocalypto
5.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 9 wins & 17 nominations.
5.actors: Rudy Youngblood, Dalia Hernández, Jonathan Brewer, Morris Birdyellowhead

6.plot: King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

7.plot: Armed with a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007 and must defeat a weapons dealer in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, but things are not what they seem.
7.title: Casino Royale
7.country: UK, Czech Republic, USA, Germany, Bahamas
7.writer: Neal Purvis (screenplay), Robert Wade (screenplay), Paul Haggis (screenplay), Ian Fleming (novel)
7.awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 25 wins & 39 nominations.
7.actors: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Mads Mikkelsen, Judi Dench

8.plot: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.
8.title: The Devil Wears Prada
8.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 48 nominations.
8.actors: Meryl Streep, Anne Hathaway, Emily Blunt, Stanley Tucci

9.plot: Private Joe Bauers, the definition of "average American", is selected by the Pentagon to be the guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program. Forgotten, he awakes five centuries in the future. He discovers a society so incredibly dumbed down that he's easily the most intelligent person alive.
9.title: Idiocracy
9.writer: Mike Judge (story), Mike Judge (screenplay), Etan Cohen (screenplay)
9.actors: Luke Wilson, Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard, Terry Crews

10.plot: A suburban American family is being stalked by a group of psychotic people who live in the desert, far away from civilization.
10.title: The Hills Have Eyes
10.writer: Alexandre Aja (screenplay), Grégory Levasseur (screenplay), Wes Craven
10.actors: Aaron Stanford, Kathleen Quinlan, Vinessa Shaw, Emilie de Ravin

11.plot: A woman goes in search for her daughter within the confines of a strange, desolate town called Silent Hill.
11.title: Silent Hill
11.actors: Radha Mitchell, Sean Bean, Laurie Holden, Deborah Kara Unger

12.plot: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

12.actors: Clive Owen, Juan Gabriel Yacuzzi, Michael Caine, Mishal Husain

13.plot: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.
13.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest

14.plot: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.
14.title: The Lives of Others
14.actors: Martina Gedeck, Ulrich Mühe, Sebastian Koch, Ulrich Tukur

15.plot: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.

17.plot: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 15 to her reign as queen at 19 and to the end of her reign as queen and ultimately the fall of Versailles.
17.title: Marie Antoinette
17.actors: Kirsten Dunst, Jason Schwartzman, Judy Davis, Rip Torn

18.plot: Superman reappears after a long absence, but is challenged by an old foe who uses Kryptonian technology for world domination.
18.title: Superman Returns

20.plot: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.
20.title: Little Miss Sunshine
20.actors: Abigail Breslin, Greg Kinnear, Paul Dano, Alan Arkin

21.plot: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

21.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 9 nominations.

22.plot: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.
22.title: Blood Diamond

23.plot: When a cure is found to treat mutations, lines are drawn amongst the X-Men, led by Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a band of powerful mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.
23.title: X-Men: The Last Stand

24.plot: In Venice Beach, naive Midwesterner JB bonds with local slacker KG and they form the rock band Tenacious D. Setting out to become the world's greatest band is no easy feat, so they set out to steal what could be the answer to their prayers -- a magical guitar pick housed in a rock-and-roll museum some 300 miles away.
24.title: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
24.writer: Jack Black, Kyle Gass, Liam Lynch
24.actors: Jack Black, Kyle Gass, JR Reed, Ronnie James Dio

25.plot: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional endeavor.
25.title: The Pursuit of Happyness

26.plot: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an A.T.F. agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber, but soon finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims.
26.title: Deja Vu
26.actors: Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Val Kilmer, Jim Caviezel

27.plot: In this third installment of the Final Destination series, a student's premonition of a deadly rollercoaster ride saves her life and a lucky few, but not from death itself which seeks out those who escaped their fate.
27.title: Final Destination 3
27.writer: Glen Morgan, James Wong, Jeffrey Reddick (characters)

28.plot: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.
28.title: The Holiday
28.actors: Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jude Law, Jack Black

29.plot: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks in London, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguises herself as him, and proceeds to fall for one of her soccer teammates. Little does she realize she's not the only one with romantic troubles, as she, as he, gets in the middle of a series of intermingled love affairs.
29.title: She's the Man
29.writer: Ewan Leslie (screenplay), Karen McCullah (screenplay), Kirsten Smith (screenplay), Ewan Leslie (story)
29.actors: Amanda Bynes, Channing Tatum, Laura Ramsey, Vinnie Jones
